metadata.description: Spells that read minds, detect thoughts, and analyze mental states

spells.name: Sense the Nature of Vis
spells.description: Determines if a person has the Gift, their approximate magical power, and any supernatural mental influences affecting them.

spells.name: Frosty Breath of the Spoken Lie
spells.description: Detects when the target speaks a deliberate lie. The caster senses a chill when falsehoods are spoken, though not the actual truth.

spells.name: Posing the Silent Question
spells.description: Reads the target's surface thoughts and immediate mental reactions to a specific question posed by the caster, even if spoken silently.

spells.name: Peering into the Mortal Mind
spells.description: Reads the target's current thoughts, emotions, and mental state continuously. The caster experiences what the target is thinking and feeling.
spells.guidelines: Base 25 (read all current thoughts), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration

spells.name: Thoughts Within Babble
spells.description: Reads the surface thoughts of everyone in a group, sensing the general mood and immediate concerns of the crowd.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (read surface thoughts), +2 Voice, +1 Concentration, +2 Group

spells.name: Sight of the True Form
spells.description: Reveals the target's true identity, seeing through disguises, shapechanging, or mental deceptions to know who they really are.

spells.name: Emotions Revealed in the Countenance
spells.description: Detects the target's current emotional state and any strong feelings they may be experiencing, such as love, hatred, fear, or guilt.

spells.name: Invasion of the Midnight Mind
spells.description: Reads the target's mind completely from any distance using an arcane connection, accessing memories, secrets, and deep thoughts.
spells.guidelines: Base 25 (complete mind reading), +4 Arcane Connection, +1 Concentration

spells.name: The Inexorable Search
spells.description: Searches the target's memory for specific information about a person, place, or event. The caster learns if the target knows anything relevant.
